### Contribution checklist
- [ ] Pull request has a meaningful description of its purpose
- [ ] Pull request title has a meaningful message
- [ ] Pull request title contains the related Jira task
- [ ] All commits are accompanied by meaningful commit messages
- [ ] Code quality checks passed
- [ ] Code changes are delivered to staging
- [ ] Code changes are tested and validated on staging
- [ ] Pull request has a meaningful description of its purpose
- [ ] PR created to merge into develop branch
### Code Review checklist
- [ ] Code quality checks passed
Or at least they are not failed due to the introduced changes.
- [ ] Doesn't introduce new potential bugs after the added changes were analysed from the code perspective
- [ ] Keeps performance in mind (where applicable)
